metadata.title: CVE-2022-48623 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The Cpanel::JSON::XS package before 4.33 for Perl performs out-of-boundsaccesses in a way that allows attackers to obtain sensitive information orcause a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48623` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcpanel-json-xs-perl - 4.37-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcpanel-json-xs-perl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.37-1').
